name: startup-drift-check
description: Validate workflow files, schedules, and auto flags; highlight drift or disabled jobs.

steps.title: Enumerate workflow files
steps.description: List all workflow JSON files, record schedule and auto flag, and validate schema.

steps.title: Detect drift
steps.description: Flag invalid schemas, non-startup schedules, and auto=false items; note missing descriptions or agents.

steps.title: Recommendations
steps.description: Provide actions to fix/enable/rename workflows and clean up unused files.
